SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Classes
Class
Description
AdminCtrl
The AdminCtrl class controls the admin system interface, The administrator to create new users, delete existing users, logout, and quit the application.
Album
 
AlbumOpenedCtrl
The AlbumOpenedCtrl class controls the user interface for viewing the photos within an album, presented in a grid view.
CaptionTag
Controller class for handling the addition and update of captions and tags for a photo.
CopyPhoto
The CopyPhoto class is a controller responsible for controlling the user interface for copying a photo to another album.
CreateAlbumCtrl
 
DateSearch
The DateSearch class controls the user interface for searching photos by date.
DisplaySearchRes
The DisplaySearchRes class controls the user interface for displaying search results.
EditAlbumCtrl
The EditAlbumCtrl class controls the editing of an album.
LoginController
The LoginController class controls the user interface for the login functionality.
MainCtrl
The MainCtrl class controls the main application window.
MovePhoto
The MovePhoto class controls the user interface for moving a photo to another album.
NewUser
The NewUser class controls the user interface for creating a new user.
Photo
 
Photos
 
RenameAlbum
The RenameAlbum class controls the user interface for renaming an album.
Tag
 
TagSearch
The TagSearch class controls the user interface for searching photos by tags.
User
 
UserInformation
